org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.preprocessing.text

Class KerasTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.modelimport.keras.preprocessing.text.KerasTokenizer

  • public class KerasTokenizer
extends Object
    Java port of Keras' text tokenizer, see https://keras.io/preprocessing/text/ for more information.
    Author:
    Max Pumperla

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Default Keras tokenizer constructor

      Tokenizer constructor with only numWords specified

      Create a Keras Tokenizer instance with full set of properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KerasTokenizer

        public KerasTokenizer(Integer numWords,
                      String filters,
                      boolean lower,
                      String split,
                      boolean charLevel,
                      String outOfVocabularyToken)
        Create a Keras Tokenizer instance with full set of properties.
        Parameters:
        numWords - The maximum vocabulary size, can be null
        filters - Characters to filter
        lower - whether to lowercase input or not
        split - by which string to split words (usually single space)
        charLevel - whether to operate on character- or word-level
        outOfVocabularyToken - replace items outside the vocabulary by this token

      • KerasTokenizer

        public KerasTokenizer(Integer numWords)
        Tokenizer constructor with only numWords specified
        Parameters:
        numWords - The maximum vocabulary size, can be null

      • KerasTokenizer

        public KerasTokenizer()
        Default Keras tokenizer constructor

    • Method Detail

      • fromJson

        public static KerasTokenizer fromJson(String jsonFileName)
                               throws IOException,
                                      InvalidKerasConfigurationException
        Import Keras Tokenizer from JSON file created with `tokenizer.to_json()` in Python.
        Parameters:
        jsonFileName - Full path of the JSON file to load
        Returns:
        Keras Tokenizer instance loaded from JSON
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O exception
        InvalidKerasConfigurationException - Invalid Keras configuration

      • textToWordSequence

        public static String[] textToWordSequence(String text,
                                          String filters,
                                          boolean lower,
                                          String split)
        Turns a String text into a sequence of tokens.
        Parameters:
        text - input text
        filters - characters to filter
        lower - whether to lowercase input or not
        split - by which string to split words (usually single space)
        Returns:
        Sequence of tokens as String array

      • fitOnTexts

        public void fitOnTexts(String[] texts)
        Fit this tokenizer on a corpus of texts.
        Parameters:
        texts - array of strings to fit tokenizer on.

      • fitOnSequences

        public void fitOnSequences(Integer[][] sequences)
        Fit this tokenizer on a corpus of word indices
        Parameters:
        sequences - array of indices derived from a text.

      • textsToSequences

        public Integer[][] textsToSequences(String[] texts)
        Transforms a bunch of texts into their index representations.
        Parameters:
        texts - input texts
        Returns:
        array of indices of the texts

      • sequencesToTexts

        public String[] sequencesToTexts(Integer[][] sequences)
        Turns index sequences back into texts
        Parameters:
        sequences - index sequences
        Returns:
        text reconstructed from sequences

      • textsToMatrix

        public INDArray textsToMatrix(String[] texts,
                              TokenizerMode mode)
        Turns an array of texts into an ND4J matrix of shape (number of texts, number of words in vocabulary)
        Parameters:
        texts - input texts
        mode - TokenizerMode that controls how to vectorize data
        Returns:
        resulting matrix representation
